Author: Trader-451
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Bottom line gents is we're probably fucked. It costs $2835 to mine a bitcoin in Kazakhstan according to the Elite Fixtures data. Bitcoin right now is $3250. We are not getting ANY dividends because there are no dividends. That $2835 doesn't include the cost of overhead, heating, rental, salaries. I suspect Ambit is operating at, or close to a loss right now and will probably go out of business. Fortunately for me I only put some bitcoin(I think I paid around .03 bitcoin at the time worth $96 now) from what I mined(so free) into 1000 tokens so it's not problem for me as I mine at home and the difficulty is dropping like crazy so I make up for it. But if you dumped a shitload of money into Ambit I hate to tell you you're probably not getting it back or going to see any profit sharing as there is no profit. They only way these guys can make a profit, is if they move their operation to Venezuela ($531 per bitcoin) or maybe Ukraine ($1852). These costs to generate a bitcoin is electricity only, not overhead like rent, security, salaries. The reason they are not releasing their tokens is it will dump the first day to nothing and they won't have an operation anymore. I don't think they purposely are trying to fuck us over, it's just the market. Their "Bear" worst case scenario was bitcoin at $7000 US, more than double the price of bitcoin now. I have a feeling bitcoin will probably bottom out around the $2000-$1500 level going by my experience and history of Bitcoin. That's awesome for us home miners as it actually gets more profitable because the difficulty is dropping like a rock as the big farms(like Ambit) have to shut down, especially since I get free electricity at my apartment. I'm willing to wait a few years and accumulate as much as I can until the start of the next run up which will probably be at the next halfening in May of 2020. If they ever do release their tokens and if by some miracle it gets on an exchange dump it fast, they aren't going to be able to survive the next year or so. Not their fault, just reality.  Here is the chart for electricity costs per country. Scroll down. https://www.elitefixtures.com/blog/post/2683/bitcoin-mining-costs-by-country/

Author: nira09
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: updates from the ambit team! distribution of dividends for AMBIT token holders is again postponed until next month, this is an explanation from the ambit team:  Hello, to clarify few things: our new facility is being opened in about 7 days, hence the dividends will be given in 1month and 7 days, cant be earlier, this is realistic. Market is down, we tried our best but things went not in our favour, therefore this is what we have, you can be mad, we are mad too. But this wont help, or you can support us, one month will not change much. Whole market has been down, we got hit 700$ ETH down to 500$ as the iCO was over then now down to 200$ as we tried to keep our eth for as long as possible. What MinerOne or ICERock mining has done, is that they have paid dividends from the ICO money. Meaning that I can convert few ETH now, make around 40K USD and distribute your money back to you, that is not actually from mining or hosting services. Do you really want such a thing ? This to me is cheating… We want to payout real dividends from mining and hosting services, this will be 1 months from now. ICO’s have made promises and not done a single thing, others have delayed for months and years, this is what happened to US, you seeing the overall market and its obvious that doesnt look great and please take everything into consideration and give us little more time. We will post the new video of completed facility this week. At least we do something, a lot actually Once we post the video of new facility complete then you calculate 1 month plus another 3-5 days and thats the date when dividends should go out

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Ambit mining is the only ICO with the existing mining infrastructure, experience and proven track record. All this is reflected on “Ambit Mining” youtube channel. https://www.youtube.com/c/CryptoCurrencyNetwork   All token holders will receive bi-weekly dividends: 85% of the net profits from the mining operation and 85% of the net profits from hosting services. (In accordance with the rules as setting up in the Smart contract). Dividends will be calculated and paid on bi-weekly basis in cryptocurrency. The size of the dividend will be determined in a pro-rata share of the tokens held by token holders during a full cycle before the dividend declaration. (for example, if a user held 100 tokens in the beginning of the cycle, and sold 30 during the cycle, dividend will be allocated for the remaining 70 tokens which were held during the full duration of the dividend cycle) A portion of the profits from the mining (30%) will be bootstrapped into further development and innovation of our equipment, in order to maintain profitability with the constantly increasing difficulties in mining. All the information regarding the upgrade of the equipment as well as other related development costs will be fully transparent and available to the token holders, to ensure the credibility and transparency of the project.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Dear Community Members,  There have been different opinions regarding the unlocking AMBT tokens. Some feel that we should wait until the first dividend is distributed in August (in order to avoid dumping), while others want AMBT tokens to hit exchanges right away.  In order to stay true to our promise as a community-driven ICO, we decided to conduct a vote to decide this issue. You can log in to your dashboard on our website www.ambitmining.io, cast your vote and chose your preferred option.  The voting will be live for three days, so all community members can get their say in this matter. The weight of your vote will depend on the number of tokens held (e.g if you hold 1000 tokens your vote has 10 times the weight than someone who holds 100 tokens)  We will announce the results of the vote on July 11 and proceed accordingly.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family

I also would like to participate into this contest but personally I like to see it on the exchanges to take advantage from this market recovery session. Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: You will need to register on the site (when it becomes available) to receive dividends, the first of which will be paid in August 2018.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: All token holders will receive bi-weekly dividends: 85% of the net profits from the mining operation and 85% of the net profits from hosting services. (In accordance with the rules as setting up in the Smart contract). Dividends will be calculated and paid on bi-weekly basis in cryptocurrency. The size of the dividend will be determined in a pro-rata share of the tokens held by token holders during a full cycle before the dividend declaration. (for example, if a user held 100 tokens in the beginning of the cycle, and sold 30 during the cycle, dividend will be allocated for the remaining 70 tokens which were held during the full duration of the dividend cycle)  A portion of the profits from the mining (30%) will be bootstrapped into further development and innovation of our equipment, in order to maintain profitability with the constantly increasing difficulties in mining. All the information regarding the upgrade of the equipment as well as other related development costs will be fully transparent and available to the token holders, to ensure the credibility and transparency of the project.

Body: Hey guys!  I have a question:  I have completed the KYC procedure successfully, but when I actually purchased the tokens back in may I used two wallets that I haven't registered with you guys. I did that because they contained ETH (unlike my registered wallet) and I was too lazy and stingy to transfer them to the registered wallet. I have a hardware crypto wallet and that's why I have several wallets for ETH.  How can I register my two additional wallets to unlock the tokens?  Can you give me an email address where I can get I touch with you guys?  tried to email sales@ambitmining.io but didn't receive a reply.  Thanks for the help!  Best, G

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Dear community members,   Some of you already know that we have reached the soft cap, this means that our project is officially happening! Some of you had previously asked us to delay the ICO for a while because of the bad market conditions. The Ambit team has decided to extend the ICO until June 10th. This extension won't affect our roadmap, we will still be paying out dividends from hosting services in August.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uVk796skSOY   Stay tuned for more updates  Sincerely Ambit Team

Body: Where can I read more about Ambit's hosting services facility?

Author: LeroyBro
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: From their whitepaper  https://ambitmining.io/doc/Ambit-WhitePaper.pdf:  " In order to minimize the risk of market volatility and for full transparency, Ambit Mining will be diversified, meaning the mining will be undertaken using both GPUS as well as miners. Additionally, Ambit mining will be offering a hosting facility which will accommodate up to 5 MW electricity, and will provide an extra income source for the token holders. All profits earned through the hosting operations will be evenly distributed to the tokenholders. This allows us to commence payments as soon as the hosting facility is completed. This diversification ofincome sources will allow the flexibility and minimization of risks, and reduce the inherent market uncertainty"  And  "   Alternative technologies may be developed that negate the need for cryptomining and related services. This is one of the strengths of AmbitMining, because if one product line fails for unforeseen events, then the revenue from hosting services is still available for the organization use a source of income"

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Every project has risk. From page 17 of the whitepaper (which you can find here https://ambitmining.io/doc/Ambit-WhitePaper.pdf ) :  RISKS See below for some of the risks inherent in cryptocurrencies and ICOs in general.  The risk of failure to fund the project is present. We will fully refund all token holders to their payment wallet addresses, less transaction fees, should this unlikely event occur.  The Ambit Mining Token (AMBT) may be influenced by market trends once listed on the exchanges. The value of AMBT may be influenced by events out of control of the cryptosphere, including fraud, legislative changes, tax treatment changes, new disruptive technologies and organized crime.  AMTB may not ever be tradale on the exchanges.  The mining software may not meet expectations.  There are many points of failure in this program innovation process.  Changes in mining difficulty may squeeze profit margins into insignificance after costs.   Construction timeline specified in the whitepaper is based on the reasonable estimates, but it is not guaranteed.  Alternative technologies may be developed that negate the need for cryptomining and related services. This is one of the strengths of Ambit Mining, because if one product line fails for unforeseen events, then the revenue from hosting services is still available for the organization use as a source of income.   Cryptocurrencies are extremely volatile, AMBT may suffer from these severe pricing changes. Most of the ICO funds will be spent immediately on mining hardware, so this risk does still exist for some of the funds held in cryptocurrencies produced by mining activities and not yet distributed as profit share.  Tokens may in future fall under as yet undefined tax law changes, which could significantly affect the efficiency of this type of token.  The Tokens could also face the risk of limited or no liquidity in the market. Should this happen you will not be able to sell your tokens on the exchanges.  Breakthroughs in the field of cryptographic technology could destabilize the whole industry. An example of this would be the use of quantum computers to mine Proof-of Work coins and therefore mine all available coin resources in a very short space of time. However, should this happen, the traditional banking system would be equally adversely affected.  There are no guarantees that the Tokens will increase in value; volatility in the crypto exchanges mean that the price of this Token might, at some point in the future, come down.  It is possible that the organization will fail to launch or if launched, will fail to meet profitability targets set out in the Business Model document.  Ambit Mining performance may be interrupted, suspended or delayed due to force majeure circumstances. For the purposes of this White Paper, force  majeure shall mean extraordinary events and circumstances which could not be prevented by Ambit Mining and shall include: acts of nature, wars, armed conflicts, mass civil disorders, industrial actions, epidemics, lockouts, slowdowns, prolonged shortage or other failures of energy supplies or communication service, acts of municipal, state or federal governmental agencies, other circumstances beyond Ambit Mining’s control, which were not in existence at the time of Token Launch.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Ambit mining is the next-generation mining infrastructure, which unites mining, cloud mining, and hosting services. Ambit Mining has a track record and experience in running a successful mining operation. We have already constructed 1 MW diversified mining facility in Tbilisi Free Economic Zone and 5 MW hosting facility, which has achieved 100% ROI in just 5 months. Building on this successful project, Ambit now aims to scale its operation to 20 MW and invites mining enthusiasts to join our mining family. Our experience in this field helped us to secure partnerships with the leading hardware manufacturers and companies that will allow us to run a successful and profitable mining operation.  You can find out more in the very first post on this thread or by checking out https://ambitmining.io/  Quote from: the_viper on May 21, 2018, 05:12:07 AM I am looking for investment opportunities. What benefit can I have in your project? Quote from: upisdown on May 21, 2018, 05:20:06 AM So what is the practical benefit of holding tokens? Or is it just a tool to calculate the initial investment? Quote from: pat231 on May 21, 2018, 02:12:42 PM what are the benefits of owning your token? does it mean i become a shareholder in some sense? I'm not sure as I'm understanding it right from the White Paper. All token holders will receive bi-weekly dividends: 85% of the net profits from the mining operation and 85% of the net profits from hosting services. (In accordance with the rules as setting up in the Smart contract). Dividends will be calculated and paid on bi-weekly basis in cryptocurrency. The size of the dividend will be determined in a pro-rata share of the tokens held by token holders during a full cycle before the dividend declaration. (for example, if a user held 100 tokens in the beginning of the cycle, and sold 30 during the cycle, dividend will be allocated for the remaining 70 tokens which were held during the full duration of the dividend cycle) A portion of the profits from the mining (30%) will be bootstrapped into further development and innovation of our equipment, in order to maintain profitability with the constantly increasing difficulties in mining. All the information regarding the upgrade of the equipment as well as other related development costs will be fully transparent and available to the token holders, to ensure the credibility and transparency of the project.  Quote from: Boi qaaf on May 21, 2018, 05:27:36 AM Where can I see the previous works of the team? Or maybe names of projects? https://ambitmining.io/#teams  Quote from: pat231 on May 21, 2018, 05:35:22 AM How many miners do you have at the facility at the moment? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nhPn8-pS1oQ  Quote from: Jordan Siyo on May 21, 2018, 05:41:12 AM Is your token considered a share or internal currency? It is a dividend token  Quote from: VasiloviKola on May 21, 2018, 07:49:40 AM Quote from: becruxrubbish on May 20, 2018, 05:08:22 PM Ambit Mining is an organization that was established in summer 2017, and is part of the bigger BFGroup Holding that also controls several business in Georgia such as petrol stations, poultry farm and an international audit firm. Find out more about us http://www.ambitmining.io  Where can I find info on the BFGroup? Quote from: dreadfullICO on May 21, 2018, 12:04:48 PM Quote from: VasiloviKola on May 21, 2018, 07:49:40 AM Where can I find info on the BFGroup? I am interested in this info also, would like to know more about their projects. From Beka's LinkedIn page Bitcoin Fund Group (BFGroup) May 2017 – Present (1 year 1 month)Tbilisi, Georgia Bitcoin & Fund Group is a Holding Company that operates in different industries such as Oil and Gas, Fintech, Digital Media and FMCG sector. CryptoCurrency Network - CCN is BFGroup’s online media channel with up to date information about Cryptonomy. It provides an opportunity for users to track, discuss and learn, all there is, about cryptocurrencies, mining and hosting Services.  CCN became popular for its daily vlog about building the 1 Megawatt, diversified mining farm in the Free Economic Zone in Tbilisi, Georgia - the most crypto friendly country.  Now, in addition BFGroup offers ICO consulting, Exchange Large Amount of Bitcoins and Altcoins into Fiat, Hosting service with full maintenance, 24/7 Security, CCTV, 0.05 USD electricity price, Remote desktop control and 24/7 Help Desk. BFGroup strives to provide its consumers with the best possible customer experience and an opportunity to learn all about mining and building a large mining farm.   Quote from: the_viper on May 21, 2018, 02:05:34 PM When is the status bar for sales going to be updated? It is updated daily  Quote from: unsquidly on May 21, 2018, 02:07:24 PM Do you have referal bonuses? Yes. You get a referral link when you register. When someone uses your referral link, you will receive 3% of the amount that is purchased in AMBT tokens.  You can now track your referrals in your dashboard.  Quote from: upisdown on May 21, 2018, 02:09:13 PM Do you have an escrow? No.  Quote from: Boi qaaf on May 21, 2018, 02:10:45 PM It seems that you are a decent platform. what do I do to make profit with you? To participate in the ICO, go to the website here https://ambitmining.io/ and click on BUY AMBT to register and participate.  Quote from: Jordan Siyo on May 21, 2018, 02:14:09 PM Hi I am just wandering how you can guarantee lifetime profit? Thanks it's s lifetime contract. as long as mining is profitable, investors will receive dividends

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: In your dashboard  Quote from: pat231 on May 19, 2018, 05:16:54 AM I don't understand the "Ownership" concept here. What does it mean?  From the whitepaper: Ambit Mining contributors will receive Ethereum based AMBT Tokens that represent their share in Ambit Mining. These tokens will entitle the holders to the profit share from the Ambit Mining operation. 85% of the net profit will be available for token holders (Total Mining Yield), out of this 85%, 75% will be distributed as dividends, the remaining 25% will be reinvested to improve and upgrade our mining infrastructure, in order to match the increasing mining difficulty and maintain the same ROI over the years. If the cost of the actual reinvestment is less than 25%, then the remaining funds will be distributed as dividends as well. You can read more here: https://ambitmining.io/doc/Ambit-WhitePaper.pdf  Quote from: the_viper on May 19, 2018, 06:05:42 AM I'm looking for some excellent projects，Is there an air drop or bounty event for this project?  You can check out the bounty here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3131155  Quote from: tachi641 on May 19, 2018, 12:23:03 PM What is the ROI if I invest in this project?  This here will help you determine that: https://ambitmining.io/#calc  Quote from: unsquidly on May 19, 2018, 12:26:20 PM Can we mine the Token?  No  Quote from: Boi qaaf on May 19, 2018, 12:28:45 PM What all platforms will the coin be listed?  We cannot comment on exchanges.  Quote from: Jordan Siyo on May 19, 2018, 12:32:19 PM I don't get the purpose of your smart contract. What makes this project different between other similar projects?  so there are few things: 1. We have experience in mining, we have successfully completed 2 projects that are fully operational and have achieved 100% on roi in 5 months. Can’t say the same about the competition 2. We are located in Tbilisi free zone, which means we are exempt from taxes, such as income tax, corporate tax, and most importantly VAT. So that gives us around 20% saving on our hardware purchases which means more miners which means more profitability. i don't like to talk about competition as I am not fully aware of their projects but you can do your own research what is the VAT in other countries. As for IRM there has been lot of negative news coming from KZ about them planning to ban mining, again do your own research. 3. Electricity cost, we have electricity at 5cents per kW/h, which is very competitive price across the world and it’s on paper. MIO has 6.5 euro cent, IRM i’m not sure. 4. We are doing our due diligence, we are a resposnible company that understands that we are a security, so to be compliant with SEC we are not accepting any US investors and do KYC on all our customers. IRM as far as i know doesn’t do KYC at all (which in my opinion is going to get them in lot of issues when they try to deal with banks) and MIO does KYC only on BTC (again i might be wrong) 5. We are not promising outrageous returns on investment compared to the above mentioned competitors (especially IRM which promises 350% ROI or something along these lines) 6. We are a diversified operation, meaning that we will be mining not only BTC but altcoins as well which minimizes the risk attached to one coin. Both IRM and MIO are only mining BTC 7. We are also offering hosting services as another option to diversify the risk to our token holders, as hosting provides a stable income despite the price on the market

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Ambit mining is the only ICO with the existing mining infrastructure, experience and proven track record. All this is reflected on “Ambit Mining” youtube channel. The company is located in Georgia, Tbilisi Free economic zone, which gives various benefits such as, cheap green electricity of 5 cents, no tax or VAT, and favorable government regulations. It partners with major mining hardware and cooling system manufacturers, farther decreasing consumption of electricity. Our main value is transparency and experience. Every variable related to the mining operation will be disclosed to the token holders, each token holder will have voting right to influence important business decisions.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Please ask bounty related questions on the bounty thread here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3131155

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Our farm is located in Georgia, one of the most crypto friendly countries in the world, with abundant green electricity and favorable government legislation. The mining farm is located in Tbilisi Free Zone, which is a tax-free area in Georgia. Meaning that operation will be exempt from a majority of licenses, taxes and will benefit from simplified procedures. Ambit mining has already constructed 1 MW diversified farm in Georgia, which generated over 1.3 mln profit per year, with these experience we aim to further expand our operations and to share the profits with the community.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Yes I think they will be fine. From their whitepaper:  "In order to minimize the risk of market volatility and for full transparency, Ambit Mining will be diversified, meaning the mining will be undertaken using both GPUS as well as miners. Additionally, Ambit mining will be offering a hosting facility which will accommodate up to 5 MW electricity, and will provide an extra income source for the token holders. All profits earned through the hosting operations will be evenly distributed to the token holders. This allows us to commence payments as soon as the hosting facility is completed. This diversification of income sources will allow the flexibility and minimization of risks, and reduce the inherent market uncertainty."

Author: VenturaBro
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Good point. From their whitepaper:  "In order to minimize the risk of market volatility and for full transparency, Ambit Mining will be diversified, meaning the mining will be undertaken using both GPUS as well as miners. Additionally, Ambit mining will be offering a hosting facility which will accommodate up to 5 MW electricity, and will provide an extra income source for the token holders. All profits earned through the hosting operations will be evenly distributed to the token holders. This allows us to commence payments as soon as the hosting facility is completed. This diversification of income sources will allow the flexibility and minimization of risks, and reduce the inherent market uncertainty."  The WP goes in more detail but it's a great strategy.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: All token holders will receive bi-weekly dividends: 85% of the net profits from the mining operation (including the existing farm), and 85% of the net profits from hosting services. (In accordance with the rules as setting up in the Smart contract). Dividends will be calculated and paid on bi-weekly basis in cryptocurrency. The size of the dividend will be determined in a pro-rata share of the tokens held by token holders during a full cycle before the dividend declaration. (for example, if a user held 100 tokens in the beginning of the cycle, and sold 30 during the cycle, dividend will be allocated for the remaining 70 tokens which were held during the full duration of the dividend cycle) A portion of the profits from the mining (30%) will be bootstrapped into further development and innovation of our equipment, in order to maintain profitability with the constantly increasing difficulties in mining. All the information regarding the upgrade of the equipment as well as other related development costs will be fully transparent and available to the token holders, to ensure the credibility and transparency of the project.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family

Author: AmbitICO

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: All token holders will receive bi-weekly dividends: 85% of the net profits from the mining operation (including the existing farm), and 85% of the net profits from hosting services. Token holders will submit their payout addresses in their Ambit Mining portal allowing bi-weekly profit share to be paid directly to their ETH wallets.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: You will be able to trade them on exchanges normally, like other ERC20 tokens.    And I mean to receive the dividends they must be on your platform not on the exchanges, right? You'll be able somehow to track them?  To receive dividends you must keep the tokens on your personal wallet, a smart contract will handle the process when dividends are due. If you keep the tokens on an exchange, you do not get the dividend.   Anyway it might be, there must be an easy way to trade them.  On exchanges. We are in talks with several now. We cannot name them due to NDA.   Also I see in your Roadmap, February 2018 1MGW farm 100% ROI. Can you provide any kind of proof of that? Like some mining history.  Check out the channel. Which contains all kinds of walkthroughs of both facilities, as well as spreadsheet episodes: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqzel0d35Olk-E7s-XaumUw   And I ask you this because on Genesys or HashFlare is pretty easy to calculate your profits, there you know exactly what you mine so..  It shows what you will mine in that moment, but mining always faces changes, and has to adapt to them.   By the way, personally I think this is a great project, me and a few friends want to take part in this, but as many of us here, we want any kind of info we can get. Anyway this seems the most legit and professional mining ICO that I is out there. Looking forward to your reply and many thanks in advance  Thank you for the kind words, they are much appreciated. I hope you decide to join the Ambit family.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: There is no individual cap.  Quote from: Pasadoble on May 01, 2018, 10:24:39 AM Quote from: drogas on May 01, 2018, 10:09:04 AM Quote from: loup on May 01, 2018, 09:24:09 AM Quote from: manusiakarton on May 01, 2018, 09:17:15 AM Quote from: HellDiverUK on May 01, 2018, 08:53:29 AM the sale of the token ambit was a little slow, when viewed from the supporters should attract many investors, hopefully can reach on the soft seal for the sale of token ambit indeed the sale of Ambit tokens is a bit slow the teams have to work hard to attract more and more investors, still about 3 million more tokens for softcap achieved I'm sure this project can get through it. It looks like the market is recovering. Let's hope this encourage the investors to invest more in ICO's.  Also hope the 18% discount will encourage more people to join in as well.  Is there discount available? where can I find additional info?  Yes, for the first 8 million tokens in the main sale it is 18%, then it breaks down to 10%, 5%, and then no more bonuses.  Quote from: AmericanBit on May 02, 2018, 07:43:08 AM When the public sale ends?  May 30, 12:00 PM GMT+4    Quote from: wingding on May 02, 2018, 07:56:25 AM Tell me, do you have a project prototype or MVP? Now people do not willingly invest only in idea.  Yes, ambit already has a facility up and running.  You can see more about that here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EdU0AN2ULbY&feature=youtu.be  Quote from: pat231 on May 02, 2018, 11:12:44 AM What advantages are offered by us if investment in this project?  All token holders will receive bi-weekly dividends: 85% of the net profits from the mining operation (including the existing farm), and 85% of the net profits from hosting services. (In accordance with the rules as setting up in the Smart contract). Dividends will be calculated and paid on bi-weekly basis in cryptocurrency. The size of the dividend will be determined in a pro-rata share of the tokens held by token holders during a full cycle before the dividend declaration. (for example, if a user held 100 tokens in the beginning of the cycle, and sold 30 during the cycle, dividend will be allocated for the remaining 70 tokens which were held during the full duration of the dividend cycle) A portion of the profits from the mining (30%) will be bootstrapped into further development and innovation of our equipment, in order to maintain profitability with the constantly increasing difficulties in mining. All the information regarding the upgrade of the equipment as well as other related development costs will be fully transparent and available to the token holders, to ensure the credibility and transparency of the project.    Quote from: zenting on May 02, 2018, 01:13:49 PM The project deserves attention. During what time your token will be presented on the exchange for bidding?  After the ICO ends. Other than that we cannot comment on exchanges.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Early Bonus For Contributors  Dear community members, There have been concerns regarding the 18% bonus that we are giving out for the first 8 Million AMBT tokens. We appreciate our early investors who supported us and contributed early during the presale stage. In order to show our gratitude, we will award extra 5% tokens on top of original purchase to everyone who purchased during the presale. We have also updated the referral information in the user's dashboard, so now you can track how many people have registered with your link and how many tokens you will receive.  Stay tuned for big updates coming soon.  Sincerely, Ambit Team

Body: GUYS, this project is a hidden gem. Anyone should really put in some time and read at least the first page of there project www.ambitmining.io All put together on one page. Very professional. Green power, professional team and all the transparency.  THIS IS MADE FOR SUCCESS.  I understand, Beka wants to go low with the marketing budget. Maybe he should think again. This world is unfortunately build on fast information. Nobody will search for AmbitMining. The Ivan on tech video was a good step in this direction. I really hope, you guys will show, how to mine, how to host how to keep this crypto decentralized. This is what we need. Independency from the big players. And this is what Ambit is doing.  And for gods sake, a note to investors: Check their website for the information about the economical and political stability. I never thought, that Georgia can be do better than some crazy european government who do not understand what is the future.  I already have invested and I hope you do some research, compare to peer group competitors (some have really crazy communication skills) and you come out with a decision  PRO AMBITMINING!  Go Beka!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: You should always do your own due diligence when investing and take the time to check out each project yourself.  Ambit mining is the only ICO with the existing mining infrastructure, experience and proven track record. All this is reflected on “Ambit Mining” youtube channel. The company is located in Georgia, Tbilisi Free economic zone, which gives various benefits such as, cheap green electricity of 5 cents, no tax or VAT, and favorable government regulations. It partners with major mining hardware and cooling system manufacturers, farther decreasing consumption of electricity. Our main value is transparency and experience. Every variable related to the mining operation will be disclosed to the token holders, each token holder will have voting right to influence important business decisions.  Green Electricity All our mining units are powered by 100% renewable hydro energy ensuring cheap and clean electricity supply at only 5 cents per kW/h.  Location Our farm is located in Georgia, one of the most crypto friendly countries in the world, with abundant green electricity and favorable government legislation.  Experience Ambit mining has already constructed 1 MW diversified farm in Georgia, which generated over 1.3 mln profit per year, with these experience we aim to further expand our operations and to share the profits with the community.  Tax-Free The mining farm is located in Tbilisi Free Zone, which is a tax-free area in Georgia. Meaning that operation will be exempt from a majority of licenses, taxes and will benefit from simplified procedures.  Technology Ambit mining has partnerships with major chip manufacturers, as well as listed company Schneider Electric which will provide cooling and wiring solutions to ensure cost-efficient operation and to maximize the profits from the mining operation.  Transparency Ambit Mining will establish itself as one of the leading mining operations in terms of disclosure and transparency. Every variable related to the mining operation will be disclosed to the token holders These variables include the following:  Mining equipment Transparency ● Make Model and Serial Numbers of the units for all mining rigs. ● Full disclosure of what units are removed or changed due to technical repairs or any malfunction or reduced mining capacity. ● Full disclosure on energy usage of the mine on a monthly basis.  Mining Return Transparency ● Daily mining returns to ensure complete revenue disclosure. ● Full daily stats pertaining to the mined blocks found and pool luck. ● Full monthly breakdown of expenses. ● Daily breakdown of the total hashing power of the mine – Including the average hashing rate for each miner for that particular day.  A full development cycle will commence building our enhanced Mine Dashboard, Blockchain API, and management software. The Mine will be connected to the user interface dashboard through the API. The Mine will submit real-time data to our portal, which will collect all information from The Mine and display data to our token holders. This data will include daily mining stats, daily mining returns, daily blocks found, and all other data pertaining to the operation of the Mine. All the information submitted can be verified. This process allows for the creation a fully transparent mining operation safeguarding your profit share. Token holders will submit their payout addresses in their Ambit Mining portal allowing bi-weekly profit share to be paid directly to their ETH wallets.  Profit Overall even with quite reserved assumptions of cryptocurrencies the mining farm provides an opportunity to invest in a high return on investment project. What’s more important is the fact that this is an already existing business model and the dividend payout start from the first month of ICO completion. And by the end of 1 full year of operations provides 171% ROI to the token holders, assuming the growth in popularity of the cryptocurrencies and the previous trends where every year the price of BTC has at least doubled, it’s a fair assumption that mining returns might be even higher than we expect.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: All token holders will receive bi-weekly dividends: 85% of the net profits from the mining operation (including the existing farm), and 85% of the net profits from hosting services. (In accordance with the rules as setting up in the Smart contract). Dividends will be calculated and paid on bi-weekly basis in cryptocurrency. The size of the dividend will be determined in a pro-rata share of the tokens held by token holders during a full cycle before the dividend declaration. (for example, if a user held 100 tokens in the beginning of the cycle, and sold 30 during the cycle, dividend will be allocated for the remaining 70 tokens which were held during the full duration of the dividend cycle) A portion of the profits from the mining (30%) will be bootstrapped into further development and innovation of our equipment, in order to maintain profitability with the constantly increasing difficulties in mining. All the information regarding the upgrade of the equipment as well as other related development costs will be fully transparent and available to the token holders, to ensure the credibility and transparency of the project.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Quote from: AmbitICO on April 11, 2018, 05:43:41 PM  Green Electricity All our mining units are powered by 100% renewable hydro energy ensuring cheap and clean electricity supply at only 5 cents per kW/h.  Location Our farm is located in Georgia, one of the most crypto friendly countries in the world, with abundant green electricity and favorable government legislation.  Experience Ambit mining has already constructed 1 MW diversified farm in Georgia, which generated over 1.3 mln profit per year, with these experience we aim to further expand our operations and to share the profits with the community.  Tax-Free The mining farm is located in Tbilisi Free Zone, which is a tax-free area in Georgia. Meaning that operation will be exempt from a majority of licenses, taxes and will benefit from simplified procedures.  Technology Ambit mining has partnerships with major chip manufacturers, as well as listed company Schneider Electric which will provide cooling and wiring solutions to ensure cost-efficient operation and to maximize the profits from the mining operation.  Transparency Ambit Mining will establish itself as one of the leading mining operations in terms of disclosure and transparency. Every variable related to the mining operation will be disclosed to the token holders These variables include the following:  Mining equipment Transparency ● Make Model and Serial Numbers of the units for all mining rigs. ● Full disclosure of what units are removed or changed due to technical repairs or any malfunction or reduced mining capacity. ● Full disclosure on energy usage of the mine on a monthly basis.  Mining Return Transparency ● Daily mining returns to ensure complete revenue disclosure. ● Full daily stats pertaining to the mined blocks found and pool luck. ● Full monthly breakdown of expenses. ● Daily breakdown of the total hashing power of the mine – Including the average hashing rate for each miner for that particular day.  A full development cycle will commence building our enhanced Mine Dashboard, Blockchain API, and management software. The Mine will be connected to the user interface dashboard through the API. The Mine will submit real-time data to our portal, which will collect all information from The Mine and display data to our token holders. This data will include daily mining stats, daily mining returns, daily blocks found, and all other data pertaining to the operation of the Mine. All the information submitted can be verified. This process allows for the creation a fully transparent mining operation safeguarding your profit share. Token holders will submit their payout addresses in their Ambit Mining portal allowing monthly profit share to be paid directly to their ETH wallets.  Profit Overall even with quite reserved assumptions of cryptocurrencies the mining farm provides an opportunity to invest in a high return on investment project. What’s more important is the fact that this is an already existing business model and the dividend payout start from the first month of ICO completion. And by the end of 1 full year of operations provides 171% ROI to the token holders, assuming the growth in popularity of the cryptocurrencies and the previous trends where every year the price of BTC has at least doubled, it’s a fair assumption that mining returns might be even higher than we expect.   There is also already one facility up and running.  Please visit https://ambitmining.io/ to learn more and check out the Youtube tab to see more about the already existing facility.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: All token holders will be entitled to 85% of net profits from the mining operations. Out of which 75% will be paid will be calculated and paid on bi-weekly basis in ETH. The size of the dividend will be determined in a pro-rata share of the tokens held by token holders during a full dividend cycle (every 2 weeks) before the dividend declaration. (for example if an user held 100 tokens in the beginning of the cycle, and sold 30 during the cycle, dividend will be allocated for the remaining 70 tokens which were held during the full duration of the dividend cycle).  A portion of the profits from the mining (25%) will be bootstrapped into further development and innovation of information regarding the upgrade of the equipment as well as other related development costs will be fully transparent and available to the token holders, to ensure the credibility and transparency of the project. If the actual reinvestment cost is less than 25%, then the remaining funds will also be distributed as dividends  More in the whitepaper here: https://www.ambitmining.io/doc/Ambit-WhitePaper.pdf

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: There are no plans for future airdrops at this time.  Quote from: Emily_techy on April 06, 2018, 06:34:25 AM Will it be available on exchange in near future??  Listings will happen after the ICO ends.  Quote from: Ridorie on April 06, 2018, 01:31:38 PM Quote from: BeruchN on April 06, 2018, 12:13:25 PM Quote from: LeroyBro on April 06, 2018, 10:03:03 AM Quote from: Sandra_techy on April 06, 2018, 06:32:40 AM The project is really bringing a promising ICO.  I think one of the most promising ICOs of the year for sure. Looking forward to the presale in 4 days!  same, already signed up for the whitelist, waiting excitedly  In order to participate in the project must be pre-registered? Is it planned to use the KYC procedure in ICO or will it be completely anonymous?  As per legal requirements, there will be KYC. You do not have to pre-register to participate in the sale, but if you buy tokens before your KYC is approved, your tokens will be locked until it is approved. KYC begins when the presale opens. Jumio is doing our KYC

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Hello, community. Ambit Mining Team is inviting you to an investor meeting, to meet us personally and answer all your questions. We will arrange 2 day trip to Georgia which will include accommodation and living expenses. You will have a chance to see our existing mining and hosting infrastructure and find out more about our future business plans. For more information please contact us at sale@ambitmining.io   https://i.imgur.com/WH9TCFq.png

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Dividends will be calculated and paid on monthly basis in cryptocurrency. The size of the dividend will be determined in a pro-rata share of the tokens held by token holders during a full cycle before the dividend declaration. (for example, if a user held 100 tokens in the beginning of the cycle, and sold 30 during the cycle, dividend will be allocated for the remaining 70 tokens which were held during the full duration of the dividend cycle).

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Crypto Firm Ambit Mining Seeks Expansion with Token Pre-Sale in April 2018  Georgian cryptocurrency mining company Ambit Mining has just announced plans to further expand its top notch infrastructure with a crowdfunding campaign to be launched next month, starting with a pre-sale event on April 10th, 2018.  With a reputation backed by a superb track record of successful operations in cloud performance and hosting services in cryptocurrency mining, Ambit Mining already owns some of the most modern and sophisticated infrastructure including a 1MW diversified mining facility located in the Tbilisi Free Economic Zone, as well as a 5MW hosting facility which recorded a 100% return on investment in only five short months.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/ambit-mining-seeks-expansion-with-token-pre-sale/

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: All token holders will receive monthly dividends: 85% of the net profits from the mining operation (including the existing farm), and 85% of the net profits from hosting services. (In accordance with the rules as setting up in the Smart contract). Dividends will be calculated and paid on monthly basis in cryptocurrency. The size of the dividend will be determined in a pro-rata share of the tokens held by token holders during a full cycle before the dividend declaration. (for example, if a user held 100 tokens in the beginning of the cycle, and sold 30 during the cycle, dividend will be allocated for the remaining 70 tokens which were held during the full duration of the dividend cycle)  For more information on how the dividends work you can email contact@ambit.io or stop by https://ambitmining.io/ and check out the documents tab.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Ambit Mining is an organization that was established in the Summer 2017, and is part of the bigger BFGroup Holding that also controls several businesses in Georgia such as Petrol stations, poultry farms and an international audit firm. In November Ambit Mining completed the construction of its first fully functional and diversified Mining farm in the Free Economic Zone, Tbilisi, Georgia, with the capacity of 1 MW. Following the success and profitability of the farm, now Ambit Mining provides an opportunity for mining enthusiasts to become part of the mining family and further expand the existing, profitable mining operation to reach up to 20 MW capacity. Instead of offering the investment opportunity to the few large investors, Ambit Mining ICO allows the individuals interested in cryptocurrency mining to enter the mining operation and share the profits of the future operation. We welcome the members of the community to join us in this journey of building our new future together.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Meet Ambit Founder & CEO Beka Vashakidze.  Beka is a serial entrepreneur and blockchain pioneer in Georgia, CEO of BFGroup Holding company that operates in cryptocurrency mining.  Find out more information about us and our team members on https://ambitmining.io/   AMBIT BOUNTY PROGRAM IS LIVE: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3131155

Author: CryptoMiner3
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Hi ambitico  Why the calculator on your website, assumes you're distributing 75% of revenues (25% reinvest & 75% released) While in the white page it says its 85% of the revenues?

Author: CryptoMiner3
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: I know the calculations on your website are just examples, and not promising any real revenues ..etc  But would it be hard to add the "difficulty" factor to the "Charts of Return" ?  Or was the difficulty factor taken in consideration already?? (I don't know ... I'm asking)   Because showing 'potential' revenues for 5 years using today's difficulty factor is inaccurate (even if the target is to merely illustrate potential).  I would appreciate it if you at least 'assume' 2% increase in difficulties every 2 weeks... Rather than assuming its the same for 5 years    All in all, it looks like a VERY promising ICO... Will keep an eye on it.

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: Keep in mind that 85% of the supply is available in the ICO.  Also (somewhat?) unrelated here is an Ambit explainer video https://youtu.be/B4OQLF5Zvas

Author: CryptoMiner3
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: In 01:16 of the video you're referring to... it says, 85% of mining operations. Page 8 of WP (5th paragraph), says 85%  Then on the ICO website, it says 25% reinvested (so 75% released) and in WP page 4 (3rd paragraph) its 75% WP page 5 also says its 75%   So which one is the correct? 75% or 85%?   Thanks

Author: IcoGuide.com
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: IcoGuide has reviewed Ambit Mining ICO. Take a look at the review here https://icoguide.com/en/ico/ambit

Author: AmbitICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Ambit (AMBT) Become part of the Mining Family
Body: How it works is that token holders are entitled to 85% of net profit (85% of supply available), out of which 75% is distributed as dividend and 25% is kept for reinvestment for improving and upgrading the farm. If the actual reinvestment is less than 25% the remainder funds will also be distributed as dividends. We are updating that section in the whitepaper to make it more clear.
